message:
Anybody have experience with HTML5 Mobile Application Frameworks ?
Which one is better ? and why ?

for example :

Sencha Touch
JQuery Mobile
Ionic and AngularJS
Kendo UI
Appcelerator Titanium
App Framework 
Twitter Bootstrap 3
TopCoat

data.message:
First, we should separate between:
- Mobile UI Framework & cross-platform framework

- Mobile UI Framework: 
Used to just layout and ui your mobile app “HTML5 Mobile User Interface” 
Like (jQuery mobile, Kendo UI, Sencha Touch, Twitter Bootstrap 3 , etc. …)

- Cross-Platform Framework:
Framework for developing mobile applications using web technologies: HTML, CSS and
JavaScript and output can run into multi mobile platforms.
               Like my favorites:  
1-  ‘cordova’ - PhoneGap by Adobe  : you will find a lot of resources on the web and many companies use it , supported by Great Adobe and very easy to use 
2-  Intel ® XDK : I find it powerful and it’s lightweight UI  is amazing .
http://blog.mohnady.com/2012/08/one-platform-for-mobile-development.html
https://cordova.apache.org/
http://phonegap.com/
https://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/tools
Yes I mean Mobile UI Framework

Mohamed Nady مايكروسفت تقريبا شافت كلامك امبار ومحبتش تزعلك :)
http://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/explore/cordova-vs.aspx

Thanks Mohamed Nady. Ana estafadt gedan men el post da.. tell me please which   mobile ui framework u recommand from the ones that you just mentioned, I tried twitter bootstrap and found it not that practical.. or maybe i didnt find tge right educational materials?
Yehya Hafez everyone has favorite one :) you should try it by your self and decide  will not take along time.
